title: My account got banned
body:
I don’t know why but can it please be unbanned because I do not want to lose all the money I have spent buying skins of my champs that I love to play and waste all the time I have spent playing.
I do not know why I was banned due to the fact I can’t acess the email connected this account

replies.body: Your account hasn't been banned. It looks like someone [**issued a chargeback**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334) for some of the purchases on this account so those funds were returned to the bank account. After the refund, all of that purchased content remains on the account until the chargeback has been repaid.
How to repay and how much do I repay?
